thailand.title: Thailand
thailand.description: Experience the vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and bustling cities of Thailand.
thailand.longDescription: This tour takes you through Thailand's most iconic destinations including Bangkok's Grand Palace, Phuket's beaches, and Chiang Mai's temples. Enjoy authentic Thai cuisine, traditional dance performances, and relaxing spa treatments. The package includes guided tours, comfortable accommodations, and domestic flights.

itineraryDays.title: Bangkok City Tour
activities: Visit Grand Palace and Wat Phra Kaew
Lunch cruise on Chao Phraya River

itineraryDays.title: Phi Phi Islands Excursion
activities: Speedboat tour to Phi Phi Islands

vietnam.title: Vietnam
vietnam.location: Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
vietnam.description: Discover the rich history, stunning landscapes, and vibrant cities of Vietnam.
vietnam.longDescription: This comprehensive tour covers Vietnam's highlights from Hanoi's Old Quarter to Ha Long Bay's limestone karsts and Ho Chi Minh City's war history. Experience Vietnamese cuisine, water puppet shows, and the Mekong Delta's floating markets. The package includes domestic flights, guided tours, and comfortable accommodations.

itineraryDays.title: Ha Long Bay to Da Nang
Flight to Ho Chi Minh City
activities: Morning flight to Ho Chi Minh

sri-lanka.title: Sri Lanka
sri-lanka.description: Explore the cultural treasures and natural wonders of Sri Lanka.
sri-lanka.longDescription: This tour covers Sri Lanka's cultural triangle including ancient cities, tea plantations, and wildlife safaris. Visit the Temple of the Tooth in Kandy, climb Sigiriya Rock Fortress, and go on a safari in Yala National Park. The package includes comfortable stays, guided tours, and private transportation.

itineraryDays.title: Nuwara Eliya
activities: Scenic train ride to Nuwara Eliya

indonesia.title: Indonesia
indonesia.description: Experience the diverse cultures and stunning landscapes of Indonesia's islands.
indonesia.longDescription: This tour combines Bali's beaches and temples with Jakarta's urban energy. Visit Uluwatu Temple, experience Balinese dance, explore Ubud's rice terraces, and discover Jakarta's colonial history. The package includes domestic flights, cultural experiences, and beachfront stays.

mauritius.title: Mauritius
mauritius.description: Relax in paradise with Mauritius' white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters.
mauritius.longDescription: This luxury beach getaway includes stays at premium resorts, water sports, and island exploration. Visit Chamarel's colored earth, swim with dolphins, enjoy catamaran cruises, and relax at world-class spas. The package combines relaxation with adventure in this Indian Ocean paradise.
includes: Catamaran cruise to Île aux Cerfs

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Mauritius
activities: Arrival at Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam Airport

nepal.title: Nepal
nepal.description: Discover the Himalayan kingdom with its ancient temples and mountain vistas.
nepal.longDescription: This tour combines Kathmandu's cultural heritage with Pokhara's natural beauty. Visit UNESCO World Heritage Sites, experience traditional Newari culture, enjoy Himalayan views, and take a sunrise mountain flight. The package includes comfortable stays, guided tours, and domestic flights.

bhutan.title: Bhutan
bhutan.description: Experience the last Himalayan kingdom with its dzongs, monasteries, and stunning landscapes.
bhutan.longDescription: This cultural journey through Bhutan includes visits to Tiger's Nest Monastery, traditional farmhouse stays, and explorations of Thimphu's unique sites. Experience Bhutanese hospitality, Buddhist culture, and breathtaking mountain scenery. The package includes all meals, accommodations, and guided tours.

itineraryDays.title: Hike to Tiger's Nest
activities: Full day hike to Taktsang Monastery

africa.title: Africa
africa.description: Experience the ultimate African safari adventure across multiple countries.
africa.longDescription: This premium safari package combines Kenya's Masai Mara, Tanzania's Serengeti, and South Africa's Kruger National Park. Witness the Great Migration, Big Five game drives, and diverse African landscapes. The package includes luxury lodge stays, domestic flights, and expert safari guides.
includes: All game drives and park fees

azerbaijan.title: Azerbaijan
azerbaijan.description: Discover the blend of ancient and modern in this Caspian Sea nation.
azerbaijan.longDescription: This tour explores Azerbaijan's capital Baku with its medieval Old City and futuristic Flame Towers. Visit the mud volcanoes of Gobustan, the fire temple of Ateshgah, and experience Azerbaijani cuisine. The package includes guided tours, comfortable stays, and unique cultural experiences.

dubai-uae.title: Dubai & UAE
dubai-uae.description: Experience the ultramodern architecture and Arabian hospitality of the UAE.
dubai-uae.longDescription: This luxury tour covers Dubai's iconic landmarks and Abu Dhabi's cultural sites. Visit Burj Khalifa, experience desert safaris, explore Louvre Abu Dhabi, and enjoy world-class shopping. The package includes premium hotel stays, private tours, and unique Emirati experiences.
includes: Burj Khalifa At the Top ticket

australia-new-zealand.title: Australia and New Zealand
australia-new-zealand.description: Explore the stunning landscapes and vibrant cities of Australia and New Zealand.
australia-new-zealand.schedule: Every first and third Monday of month
australia-new-zealand.longDescription: This comprehensive tour covers Sydney's iconic landmarks, New Zealand's breathtaking fjords, and Maori cultural experiences. Visit the Sydney Opera House, explore Milford Sound, and experience adventure activities in Queenstown. The package includes inter-country flights, premium accommodations, and guided tours.

japan.title: Japan
japan.description: Discover the perfect blend of ancient traditions and cutting-edge modernity in Japan.
japan.longDescription: This immersive journey takes you from Tokyo's neon-lit streets to Kyoto's serene temples, with bullet train rides, cultural workshops, and culinary experiences. Visit shrines, experience tea ceremonies, explore samurai history, and witness Japan's famous cherry blossoms (seasonal).
includes: Entrance fees to all listed attractions

china.title: China
china.description: Experience the rich history and modern marvels of China's most iconic cities.
china.longDescription: Journey through China's fascinating contrasts, from the ancient Great Wall and Forbidden City in Beijing to Shanghai's futuristic skyline. Explore traditional hutongs, marvel at the Terracotta Warriors, cruise the Huangpu River, and savor authentic Chinese cuisine while experiencing both imperial grandeur and cutting-edge modernity.
includes: Entrance fees to all listed attractions

itineraryDays.title: Temple of Heaven & Departure to Shanghai
Day Trip to Suzhou
activities: Return to Shanghai for farewell dinner
